ygData.subject: Heritrix 1.12.0 Release Candidate
ygData.msgSnippet: A release candidate build for the upcoming Heritrix 1.12.0 release is now available from the Heritrix build box,

A release candidate build for the upcoming Heritrix 1.12.0 release is 
now available from the Heritrix build box, 
<http://builds.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/buildresults/HEAD-heritrix>.

Specifically, build #116 -- "heritrix-1.11.0-200703122120" -- is 
considered public Release Candidate 1 and may be downloaded here:

http://builds.archive.org:8080/cruisecontrol/artifacts/HEAD-heritrix/20070312212008/

Draft release notes are available here:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+1.12.0

If you have the chance, please give this code a try with your typical 
configurations and let us know of any issues that should be addressed in 
release notes or with urgent fixes.

Heritrix SVN HEAD is frozen against code commits, except for 
documentation issues and any critical issues which surface in the next 
couple of days.

Two process notes associated with this upcoming release:

* Project bug/issue tracking has migrated from Sourceforge to 
<http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER>, a JIRA-based system.

* The project wiki is gradually migrating from a UseMod-based wiki at 
crawler.archive.org to a Confluence wiki at 
<http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix>.

If you register to report/comment on JIRA issues, the same login will 
work for wiki edits.

- Gordon @ IA
